title: In-Unit Washer/Dryer, USB Outlets, Abundant Natural Light
posting_body: ['We are open for business!', 'To help us continue practicing safe social distancing, we are now offering tours by appointment only, or you can always meet us online for a virtual tour.', 'Contact us today to schedule a tour of your choice!', 'Edison Apartments', '100 Long Beach Blvd., Long Beach, CA, 90802', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 135', 'OR Text', '135', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'THE LIGHTS ARE ON AT EDISON APARTMENTS', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 515 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Edison Apartments is a sophisticated and stylishly appointed mid-Century modern landmark primely situated in the heart of thriving Downtown Long Beach.', 'One hundred and fifty-six luxury flats —including six penthouses—offer sweeping views and elegantly renovated interiors.', 'You’ll enjoy a residents-only fitness center and a private open-air rooftop that’s elevated in every sense—lounge by the pool, enjoy a meal, or simply gaze at the ocean.', 'Features', '- USB Outlets', '- Cat 6 Wiring', '- Stone Countertops', '- Tiled Showers', "- Up to 12' Ceilings", '- Fiber Cable Ready', '- Polished Concrete Floors', '- Ocean Breezes', '- Gas range', '- Floor-to-Ceiling Glass', '- Concierge', '- Electronic Door Locks', '- Soft-Closing Cabinets', '- Operable Friendly', '- Covered Parking', '- Grill Stations', '- Storage for Lease', '- Move-In Made Easy with our Digital Waterton Concierge', '- Gracious Landscaping with Public Art', '- Electronic Building Management System', '- Historic Lobby', '- Electric Car Stations', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Edison Apartments welcomes cats and dogs.', '2 pets per apartment are welcomed; 45lb weight limit.', 'A $300 deposit is required per pet and a monthly pet rent of $50/ will be collected.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent', 'kwNcA3qK']
